1. Get the list of channels in the Slack workspace.
2. Read the messages from the 'general' channel and identify the URLs of websites mentioned.
3. For each URL found, get the content of the webpage.
4. Summarize the content of all webpages.
5. Send the summary to the 'random' channel.
